text:
Lol it does bother me a little too - but! if you had to do braces or "begin or end" it would be insane to read.
For simple code you'll go "yea but why" but - for more heavy stuff it's makes more sense

you really only have to indent blocks. So if you have a ton of blocks consider a refactor - make another function :smile:. Chances are you'll reuse it later anyways.
